page.title: 16Methodist Church
page.content: The{Methodist Church}in Milborne Port is a large Victorian building erected in 1866 and capable of seating 350 people.Sunday worship takes place both morning and evening but congrgations are small,on average 30 adults and 20 children in the morning,and 12 adults in the evening.Most of those attending are pensioners,and the financial burdens of the quarterly payments to the Circuit,and of maintaining buildings are increasingly difficult to bear.At the same time,close relationships with other denominations in the area,together with the financial problems,make it probable that an amalgamation of two or more of the denominations will take place in the future.Monthly United services where many denominations take part are well supported.
